instructions: POST to /analyze-image - Image analysis with GPT-4o-mini
description: Upload an image file or send image URL to analyze products using GPT-4o-mini Vision

form_data_option.image: FILE - Image file (png, jpg, jpeg, gif, webp)

expected_response.analysis: STRING - Detailed analysis of products in the image in Spanish

notes: Supports both file upload and direct URL. Max file size: 25MB. Uses GPT-4o-mini for cost optimization (50 tokens max). Analysis provided in Spanish.
test_image_suggestions: Image of a laptop on a desk
Screenshot of a product you want to find similar items for
